con:elements.con:expectedValue: Increase Member Sales by 10% for Week 5 of 2017 over Week 5 of 2016

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: { "GoalId": "0fcaff08-9e21-4105-aac0-d07137b764d8", "GoalDescription": "Increase Member Sales by 10% for Week 5 of 2017 over Week 5 of 2016", "MetricTypeCode": "MEMBER_SALES", "GoalPeriodUnit": "W", "GoalPeriod": "2017 03/04", "GoalPeriodStartDate": "2017-02-26T00:00:00Z", "GoalPeriodEndDate": "2017-03-04T23:59:59Z", "GoalObjectiveCode": "INCREASE_BY", "GoalObjectiveDesc": "Increase By", "ComparisonPeriod": "2016 03/05", "ComparisonPeriodStartDate": "2016-02-28T00:00:00Z", "ComparisonPeriodEndDate": "2016-03-05T23:59:59Z", "ValueTypeCode": "PERCENTAGE", "ValueTypeDesc": "Percentage", "GoalAmount": 10.0, "ProgramCode": "PP", "CalendarType": "Fiscal(4-5-4)", "Status": "A", "CreateUser": "AUTO_USER", "CreateDate": "2022-04-07T20:49:18.285044Z", "UpdateUser": "AUTO_USER", "UpdateDate": "2022-04-07T20:49:18.285044Z" }
